name: Case History
author: RSW Studio

sections.description:
ENG
Plugin for the management of case history and case study.

ITA
Plugin per la gestione di case history e case study.

Plugin all’indirizzo http://www.matteotestoni.it/servizi/consulente-wordpress/plugin-case-history-wordpress/

Immobiliare Plugin by http://www.matteotestoni.it

Caratteristiche del plugin / Features of the plugin

ENG

  1. Case History
  2. Case Study
  3. Success Cases

ITA

  1. Case History
  2. Case Study
  3. Casi di succcesso
sections.installation:
ENG

  1. Upload ‘casehistory’ directory to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/” directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

ITA

  1. Carica la cartella ‘casehistory’ via ftp su ‘/wp-content/plugins/’
  2. Attiva il plugin attraverso la sezione ‘Plugins’ dentro all’area riservata WordPress
